message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Thank you for the offer, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. I am interested in purchasing the product for $15000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $17000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe we can find a better solution. I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.
I'm getting closer to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $16500 for the product. This is my final offer.
